input.sentences: my brother 's band was warming up for their first gig .
my brother readied his guitar in anticipation .
they played a few songs and were a hit sensation for the fans .
i bugged my brother into getting a picture with the pianist .
and we managed to make it happen !
output.sentences: Gigi loves watching her brother warm up before his gigs.
Her brother, Randy readied his guitar, winked at her, and went into a long version of a love song she loved.
Randy makes a sensation when he sings his songs in public, because he's good and Gigi knows he will be famous some day.
It did sort of bug Randy that his pianist's little sister took this pic of him wearing this hat on Gigi's birthday, but he got over it.
Today's gig was special because, Sol, who's managed other bands came over and said he wants to manage Randy's.
